title: All the Backlist! July 26, 2019
description:
This week, Liberty discusses a few great older books, including The Reapers are the Angels.
This episode is sponsored by Book Riot Insiders.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Spotify, or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
Rat Girl: A Memoir by Kristin Hersh
The Reapers are the Angels by Alden Bell
A Rising Man by Abir Mukherjee
Radio Iris by Anne-Marie Kinney
Revenge: Eleven Dark Tales by Yoko Ogawa, Stephen Snyder (translator)
Raw Shark Texts by Steven Hall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
